price: When they sensed Our punishment, they started running away from it.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
